name: Neokyo City
description:
*Made in 5 days for the Amaze Me Game Jam GMS2*

Welcome to Neokyo City, where everything is powered by NEON!

Turn off all the power in the city by hacking into power boxes, all the while avoiding laser drones in order to free the denizens of Neokyo City!

Features

- Slick, simple 2D platforming

- Semi-competant drones that use slowdown/teleporting lasers

- Interactable denizens that walking about the city

- Neon filled pipes that power the skyscraper's doors

- Neat hacking minigame for turning off interactable power boxes

- Generously big open-world map

- CAN BE COMPLETED (if you were curious)

Controls

- Move left/right: a/w , <-/-> ,controller x axis

-Jump: space, z, controller(x/a)

-Interact: enter, x or controller(o/b)

This was my attempt at making an open world game. I had so much planned for this game, but I may have been too ambitious, especially since I learned about this jam 5 days ago. Oh welp. I really hope you try it out!
